title: LATAM Region Customs Manager
content:
SpaceX was founded under the belief that a future where humanity is out exploring the stars is fundamentally more exciting than one where we are not. Today SpaceX is actively developing the technologies to make this possible, with the ultimate goal of enabling human life on Mars.
 LATAM REGION CUSTOMS MANAGER
 As the Global Trade Compliance LATAM Region Customs Manager, you will help the business understand and navigate applicable trade laws and regulations in Latin and South America.
 RESPONSIBILITIES: 

Manage all import brokerage operations within the region, including but not limited to, import permits, authorizations to ship, signatures and audits
Communicate with customs authorities in region to support import operations
Work with other departments, including Finance, Logistics, and business teams to devise and implement strategic plans to optimize import activities in region
Retain applicable import records according to local requirements
Support the selection and management of customs brokers in the LATAM region
Assist with onboarding new entities to import into the region
Obtain import data from providers and the government to support import tax reclamations and duty mitigation opportunities
Monitor import compliance changes in the region and communicate relevant changes to appropriate teams
Participate in internal compliance audits for the region

BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:

College/university degree
6+ years of experience with international trade compliance
Fluent in English with multi-lingual proficiency in Portuguese or Spanish
Current residency and work authorization in Latin America

PREFERRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:

Comprehensive and up to date knowledge of customs laws and requirements in at least one country in the Latin American region
Prior international assignments or projects
Knowledge of the aerospace and/or telecommunications industry
Proven ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment
Creative and proactive problem solver

ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS:

Willingness to travel approximately 50% of the time
SpaceX does not yet have regional offices in all regions of the world. Dependent on candidate identified, this role may not work from a SpaceX office

SpaceX is an Equal Opportunity Employer; employment with SpaceX is governed on the basis of merit, competence and qualifications and will not be influenced in any manner by race, color, religion, gender, national origin/ethnicity, veteran status, disability status, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, mental or physical disability or any other legally protected status.
